comment.body:
@KyrieBlaBla 


This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

> Реклама перестала блокироваться на страницах яндекса, так же на них пропал помощник, установил второго как браузерное расширение, но попытки заблокировать рекламу вручную бесполезны.

Напишите на support@adguard.com Помогут разобраться с программой.

```
autochladek.cz###cookie__consent__modal
```

comment.body:
This issue is caused by `@@||techradar.com^$generichide` rule from `Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List`
Please add `@@||techradar.com^$generichide,badfilter` or disable `Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List`

comment.body:
It seems that something like this:
```
edeka.de#%#document.cookie = "EDEKA_PRIVACY=@0@0@1,3,2,8,4,5,6,7@0@0@;domain=.edeka.de;path=/";
```
causes that video player works even if `tagcommander.com` is blocked (at least on my end, on Windows).

Regarding redirect resources (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/173), unfortunately it will not fix issue if request will be blocked on DNS level.

comment.body:
@zloyden 
Yes, I can confirm, adding `@@||tagcommander.com^` will make the page work on iPhone.

![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6276915/186419190-71db6431-dbb3-4fd9-9cd2-95c1e687c30d.png)

To bad, that iPhone is once again not able to solve it in some other way, like a Desktop.

The domain tagcommander is/was also breaking Booking stuff for Disneyland I once reported here: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/issues/776 It's broken, even on desktop.
So it's another example of page breakage here.
However, conclusion was, it's a Tracker and won't be unblocked. As long this is the case, I will keep it blocked, too.
Maybe a solution is planed here? https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/173 @AdamWr

comment.body:
As far as I know, AdGuard block all `QUIC` connections by default (because it cannot filter it yet), so an alternative protocol should be used as fallback.
I might be wrong and blocking `QUIC` connections might be a problem, but I suppose that this issue is caused by something else.
Please try to check if issue occurs if you disable DNS filtering.
If you issue will still occur, then please try to disable filter lists one by one and check which one causes this issue (with DNS filtering disabled).

Also, please provide detailed steps/instruction how to reproduce this issue.

@gluons could you please take a look?

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.twitch.tv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2F) ### Comment Username: @Nikos-96 > С недавнего времени начала появляться реклама перед каждым стримом. Если обновить страницу, то снова появляется. На самом деле это не совсем реклама, а просто картинка, как на скриншоте, висит где-то секунд 15 и потом начинается стрим. Самой рекламы как таковой нет. Также я заметил, что это происходит только если смотреть с аккаунта. Если выйти из аккаунта или открыть стрим в режиме инкогнито, то всё нормально. Дело не в расширениях, которые не работают в этом режиме, а именно в аккаунте на твиче, я это проверил. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/lVFqeXm.png)

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.
